name: Paper Flight (itch) (JerryJiarui)
description:
Rules:
  • Don't Crash any obstacles.
  • Can be reborn for 5 times.
  • Pass the golden rings to finish!
  • Currents can give you speed or push you upward.
  • Gather stars as much as you can.
Controls:
  • The more speed you have, the larger upward force you have.
  • High speed can keep you float.
  • Use W/S keys to make forward/backward rotation
  • Use A/D keys to make left/right rotation.
Dev plans:
  • More user friendly in-game directions/tutorial.
  • Award system at the end of play (Counting stars and remaining lives to determine whether players are playing well).
  • More special effects.
  • Improve camera when overlapping objects.
  • Add a campus scene.
  • Add more details in the storage house scene.
  • Your ideas!
